      • getChannels

        protected static java.util.List<Channel<?>> getChannels​(java.util.List<OpenemsComponent> components,
                                                        ChannelAddress channelAddress)
                                                 throws java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException
        Gets a list of Channels that match the ChannelAddress; regular expressions are allowed.
        Parameters:
        components - a list of OpenemsComponents
        channelAddress - the ChannelAddress of the GET request
        Returns:
        a list of matching Channels
        Throws:
        java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException - on regular expression error
